name: GRO+ Advanced Balancing Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Severe Signs of Thinning
about: What it is: A dermatologist-codeveloped shampoo and conditioner set that supports thinning hair by lightly exfoliating the scalp and strengthening from the root...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:- Thinning.- Volumizing.- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage..Key Benefits:.- Lightly exfoliates to remove buildup.- Gives thinning hair an instant volumizing boost.- Promotes a balanced scalp..Highlighted Ingredients:- GROActive+ Complex™: A patent-pending, AI-discovered, plant-based compound to reduce shedding..- Spanish Microalgae: A prebiotic scalp superfood that hydrates to support the skin barrier..- Niacinamide: Helps balance the scalp and protect from oxidative stress...Ingredient Callouts: These products are vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Codeveloped by dermatologists, this wash-day duo is designed for those with severe shedding. Both are powered by Vegamour’s patent-pending GROActive+ Complex™, a plant-based compound that addresses shedding and hair density. The skincare-inspired duo is also formulated with niacinamide and Spanish microalgae to promote a balanced scalp. Start with GRO+ Advanced Balancing Shampoo to gently exfoliate the scalp and remove buildup. Follow with GRO+ Advanced Balancing Conditioner, formulated without silicones to leave fine, thinning hair with hydration, shine, and increased manageability...Clinical Results: In a controlled hair-swatch study of GRO+ Advanced Shampoo and Conditioner with 40 participants, results showed:.- 75% reduction in breakage after 1 use..This Set Contains:- 8 oz/ 236 mL GRO+ Advanced Balancing Shampoo.- 8 oz/ 236 mL GRO+ Advanced Balancing Conditioner..Clean at Sephora

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Shampoo:.- Lather a quarter-sized amount onto wet hair from scalp to ends. .- Leave in for 1 minute. Rinse. .- Follow with GRO+ Advanced Balancing Conditioner for best results....Conditioner: .- After using GRO+ Advanced Balancing Shampoo, apply a quarter-sized amount onto damp hair from roots to ends..- Leave in for 2 minutes. Rinse.
